data.comment: The match has started at Camp Nou.
Valencia are pushing forward but Goncalo Guedes's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 3, Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
Throw-in for Valencia in the half of Barcelona.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
In the minute 8, Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 13, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Valencia.
Antoine Griezmann for Barcelona has been booked by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez and receives a first yellow card.
Valencia have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
In the minute 14, Valencia's Daniel Wass breaks free at Camp Nou. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Valencia.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a Barcelona throw-in in Valencia's half.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 18, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
Throw-in for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 20, It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelona.
Throw-in Valencia.
Valencia's Goncalo Guedes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 21, Barcelona have a goal kick.
Barcelona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Valencia are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Valencia's Denis Cheryshev gets in a shot on goal at Camp Nou. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 27, Ronald Araujo is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Carlos Soler of Valencia smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Valencia have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
In the minute 29, Goal! Valencia have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Mouctar Diakhaby.
Carlos Soler instrumental with a fine assist.
Ronald Araujo returns to the field for Barcelona after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 31, Barcelona's Philippe Coutinho misses with an attempt on goal.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards Valencia a goal kick.
Valencia to take a throw-in in Barcelona territory.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Valencia.
Maxi Gomez (Valencia) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Antoine Griezmann for Barcelona drives towards goal at Camp Nou. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 33, Attention is being given to Valenciaâ€™s Uros Racic and play has been suspended briefly.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Uros Racic has recovered and rejoins the match in Barcelona.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
Ball safe as Barcelona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 38, Valencia needs to be cautious. Barcelona have an attacking throw-in.
Valencia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Barcelona's Lionel Messi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Valencia defender.
In the minute 40, Throw-in high up the field for Barcelona in Barcelona.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Yunus Musah.
Can Barcelona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valencia's half?
In the minute 42, The away team has substituted Yunus Musah with Alex Blanco. Javi Gracia is thus making his first change.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a throw-in for Barcelona, close to Valencia's area.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 45, Valencia push upfield and Maxi Gomez gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Barcelona defence.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards Barcelona a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Barcelona have been given a penalty at Camp Nou...
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Free kick Barcelona.
Valencia will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Barcelona.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Valencia's Jose Luis Gaya has been booked in Barcelona.
Goal! Lionel Messi (Barcelona) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
In the minute 45, Alex Blanco (Valencia) gets a yellow card.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Valencia in the half of Barcelona.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a Valencia throw-in in Barcelona's half.
In the minute 46, Frenkie De Jong is on a sub for Sergio Busquets for Barcelona.
In the minute 47, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Barcelona.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Valencia.
In the minute 49, In Barcelona Valencia attack through Denis Cheryshev. The finish is off target, however.
Barcelona have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Valencia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 51, Barcelona drive upfield and Lionel Messi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Valencia defender.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
In the minute 52, Ronald Araujo is on target to give Barcelona a 2-1 advantage.
Barcelona to take a throw-in in Valencia territory.
Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Valencia.
In the minute 56, Martin Braithwaite (Barcelona) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Valencia defenders.
In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
At Camp Nou, Oscar Mingueza has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 58, Uros Racic for Valencia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
Can Valencia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Barcelona's half?
In the minute 60, Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergino Dest for Barcelona gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelona.
In the minute 63, Lionel Messi (Barcelona) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Barcelona's Jordi Alba breaks free at Camp Nou. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Valencia at Camp Nou.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Barcelona push forward at Camp Nou and Philippe Coutinho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Valencia defence.
Free kick Barcelona.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Valencia in their own half.
Goal! Maxi Gomez equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
In the minute 69, Jose Luis Gaya with an assist there.
Can Valencia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Barcelona's half?
Ball safe as Valencia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 71, Barcelona pushes forward through Oscar Mingueza, whose finish on goal is saved.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 72, Barcelona's Philippe Coutinho is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Barcelona capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Valencia's half?
Valencia have a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Trincao is replacing Antoine Griezmann for the home team.
Lionel Messi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Barcelona.
Barcelona are caught offside.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Barcelona.
In Barcelona, Oscar Mingueza (Barcelona) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
In the minute 78, Barcelona's Philippe Coutinho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards Valencia a goal kick.
In the minute 79, It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelona.
Barcelona make their third substitution with Clement Lenglet replacing Philippe Coutinho.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 81, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Barcelona close to the penalty box.
Lionel Messi of Barcelona gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Valencia at Camp Nou.
In the minute 84, Important block from the Valencia defence as Trincao fires in a strike for Barcelona.
Barcelona drives forward and Lionel Messi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Barcelona Barcelona attack through Lionel Messi. The finish is off target, however.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards Valencia a goal kick.
In the minute 86, The home team have replaced Pedri with Miralem Pjanic. This is the fourth substitution made today by Ronald Koeman.
In the minute 87, Javi Gracia (Valencia) is making a second substitution, with Manu Vallejo replacing Goncalo Guedes.
Miralem Pjanic (Barcelona) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Valencia at Camp Nou.
Barcelona have a dangerous throw-in.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Valencia in the half of Barcelona.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
Valencia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez blows to end the match. The final score is 2-2.
Kang In Lee is replacing Denis Cheryshev for Valencia at Camp Nou.
Jordi Alba (Barcelona) has received a yellow card from Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
